docs.lead_paragraph: UNLIKE most Bostonians on April 19, 1968, we celebrated Patriots' Day by violating Section 200 of Chapter 94 of the General Laws of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts. The law reads: "A physician or a dentist, in good faith and in the course of his professional practice only, for the alleviation of pain and suffering or for the treatment or alleviation of disease may prescribe, administer, and dispense narcotic drugs . . .

headline.main: A scientific report -The Effects of Marijuana On Human Beings; The effects of marijuana

docs.abstract: Drs Zinberg and Weil article details their study on effects of marijuana on human beings, 1st human experiments with drug ever designed according to modern principles; rept results indicate that it is unlikely that marijuana has serious detrimental physical effects in either short-term or long-term usage, that in terms of med dangers it is a relatively harmless intoxicant; suggest study on long-range psychiatric effects of drug, if any; illus
